about_the_game:
ABOUT

Get ready for Fartonauts, a hilarious party game where farts are your weapon and friendship is on the line! Recreate the classic arcade fun of the good old days as you blast your buddies with outrageous fart power.

SETTING

Imagine stepping into a brightly lit arcade, the sounds of pixelated explosions and chiptune music filling the air. But instead of joysticks and buttons, you're controlling a hilarious cast of astronauts blasting through a retro-futuristic vision of space – all fueled by the power of farts!

GAMEPLAY

Fartonauts is all about simple controls and over-the-top action! It's easy to learn, but hard to master – just like the best arcade games. Here's how it works:

  • Move with Style: Aim your farting to propel yourself through zero gravity. Time your farts just right to navigate obstacles, dodge incoming projectiles, and flank your opponents.
  • Grab and Go: See that crazy item? Use it yourself or Grab it! Keep it in your hands to use in the best moment, butt be careful! Someone might snatch it!
  • Throw Items: Once you've got something bad in your hands (bad for them, of course), let it fly! Throw at your friends and see them suffer! Or find some other strategic use cases for the item in your hands.

GAME MODES

  • Fart Royale: Everyone for themselves! Battle everyone to be the last astronaut in space!
  • Fartball: Work together with your team to score goals and fart your way to victory!
  • Deathfart: Brawl with fellow fartonauts in the space arena to amuse the audience!
  • Capture the Fart: Steal the other team's flag and bring it back to your base!
  • (Plus, many more to be discovered!)

COMING SOON!

Get ready to blast off in early 2025 when Fartonauts launches into a galaxy near you!

name: Fartonauts
short_description: Master the art of farting in Fartonauts! A wild party brawler with wacky physics in retro space! Fart to move in zero gravity, grab to throw silly items and Out-fart your friends across many hilarious game modes!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
